query:
UPDATE courses SET 
  title = 'Path I: FSL - Foundations',
  shortDescription = 'Crash Course in Essential Communication Foundations',
  price = 89900,
  originalPrice = 99900,
  totalDurationMinutes = 1800
WHERE id = 1;
